titles.title: A bill to ensure that the Secretary of the Interior collaborates fully with State and local authorities and certain nonprofit entities in managing the Corolla Wild Horse population on Federal land.
A bill to ensure that the Secretary of the Interior collaborates fully with State and local authorities and certain nonprofit entities in managing the Corolla Wild Horse population on Federal land.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats
